HTMLElementInputMode.summary: The property inputMode reflects the value of the element's inputmode attribute.

remarks.para: It provides a hint about the type of data that might be entered by the user while editing the element or its contents. This allows the browser to display an appropriate virtual keyboard.
It is used primarily on input elements, but is usable on any element in contenteditable mode.

HTMLElementInputMode.value: This attribute may have one of the following values:For details on the usage of this attribute, see the page for the inputmode HTML attribute that this property reflects.
